name: Minesweeper All The Way Down Prototype
name_original: Minesweeper All The Way Down Prototype
description:
Melt your brain speedrun any%. Current project isn't meant to be taken too seriously, I have so far only spent about five hours working on this.

Controls:

WASD to move, left click to select tile, right click to place flag. Q/E and UP/Down change scale if you need it.
